tool_description: Calculates Misinformation Exposure Score for Twitter accounts
name: MESCALC
title: MESCALC

api_list.name: get_misinformation_score_account__twitter_account__get
api_list.description: Retrieve account misinformation score by Twitter ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mescalc.p.rapidapi.com/account/{}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mescalc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mescalc.p.rapidapi.com/account/{twitter_account}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mescalc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

schema.title: TwitterAccountScore

twitter_id.title: Twitter Id
twitter_id.description: Twitter ID uniquely identifying Twitter Account

falsity_score.title: Falsity Score
falsity_score.description: Falsity calculated based on fact-checked statements

is_elite.title: Is Elite
is_elite.description: Indication if the account is considered "elite"

misinfo_exposure_score_weighted_numtweet.title: Misinfo Exposure Score Weighted Numtweets
misinfo_exposure_score_weighted_numtweet.description: Weighted indication of exposure to misinformation

following.title: Following
following.description: List of elites screen names account is following

schema.description: Extended information about Twitter account, along with its score
